Series.Overview: Everybody has a ghost story. But how many people have filmed theirs? Hear true and unbelievable stories of the paranormal as told by the people who lived through them--and actually captured their hauntings on tape. These harrowing eye-witness accounts of the unexplainable are transformed into more than tales with terrifying visual evidence. You'll have no choice but to believe your eyes.
Series.SeriesName: My Ghost Story: Caught on Camera

Episode.EpisodeName: There is Something Evil in this House

Episode.Overview: Everybody has a ghost story. But how many people have filmed theirs? Hear true and unbelievable stories of the paranormal as told by the people who lived through them--and actually captured their hauntings on tape. These harrowing eye-witness accounts of the unexplainable are transformed into more than tales with terrifying visual evidence. You'll have no choice but to believe your eyes.

This spooky special features real people telling frightening stories of actual hauntings, complete with actual footage or photos of the ghosts, apparitions, and entities they've seen.
Stories include the man who photographed images of a grim reaper haunting a California mining time; an entity that's attacked a man and bloodied him hundreds of times; a phantom caught on tape scratching a woman's back; video tape of a floating apparition that resembles a man's upper body carrying a torch; images of strange, misty orbs that show up on the photographs of children whose mother has died; and a Civil War buff who videotaped ghostly images of soldiers and gun fire at Gettysburg.

The historic Palmyra is haunted by a mother and her six children who died there in a fire two days before Christmas over 100 years ago; a Texas hotel is home to the famous ghostly "man on the stairs"; ghost children appear as orbs in Christmas pictures taken at a Pennsylvania home; a dog follows his dead mistress's spirit around a California house; and a couple's best friend comes back to visit them at Christmas after dying of breast cancer.

The opener of a series recalling supposed experiences involving ghosts includes a scientist's discovery of mysterious footage on his security camera; a ghost crew aboard a ship; the ghosts of slaves who used the Underground Railroad; the spirit of a jilted bride who haunts the hotel where she committed suicide.

A couple's home is haunted by ghosts from a slaughterhouse; a cigarette-smoking ghost inhabits a health club; an Ohio woman encounters an incubus in her bedroom; and a couple's New England lodge is destroyed by spirits.

A medium experiences the torture of a prison snitch killed by other inmates; two soldiers in Iraq are startled by ghostly encounters in abandoned bunkers; a police officer witnesses paranormal activity in a deserted spa; a spirit in an old hotel celebrates with one guest and terrifies another; and a deceased mom grants her daughter's last wish--to visit her from the other side.

A couple is haunted by the spirit of a little boy who lives in their young son's bedroom closet. A gas station owner's life is abruptly changed by the appearance of a mysterious paranormal mist with a demonic presence. An Old West ghost town lives up to its name and spooks hundreds who have visited. A dying woman gives her dog to a friend...and then she returns as their guardian angel. The spirit of Sharon Tate, who was pregnant when murdered by the Manson family, returns to the scene of the gruesome crime as a jaw-dropping apparition. And then the image of a gambler appears in a window of the old hotel where he took his own life.

Two men retire without knowing their new home sits on the graves of people who were tortured and murdered by the KKK. The Queen Mary once ruled the high seas, but now ghosts roam her decks. The ghost of the 10th President of the United States haunts his memorial grave site in Tennessee. Two women experience the results of a curse that was made on a small Texas town. A shadow man and a girl killed tragically haunt an old stagecoach stop. And, in a final twist, so many guests of an old hotel were encountering ghosts that the owners built a new area they hope will be a "ghost free zone."

A woman under assault by an aggressive entity is rescued by the spirit of her deceased son. A maid who was murdered in the 19th century continues to work at an old Texas hotel. A demon who possessed a teenager now threatens his young family. Ghosts of stars from the silent film era morph onto actors as deformed body parts in a modern movie. Spirits ranging from a daughter who committed suicide to the family dog still haunt the house they called home. And a diner frequently serves its customers portions of the paranormal.

Episode.EpisodeName: It Watches Me While I Sleep
Episode.Overview: "Mysteriously Moving Giraffe" - (private home), San Gabriel, California "Demonic Voice" - This is the Place Heritage Park, Salt Lake City, Utah "The Gangster Ghost Bar" - Liquid Assets Gentlemen's Club, South Plainfield, New Jersey "Ghostly Intruder" - Mill Agent's House, North Vassalboro, Maine "A Brutal Murder Revealed" - Kenniston Hill Inn, Boothbay, Maine "Spirits in the Basement" - (200 year old private home), California, Pennsylvania
An unknown axe murderer still stalks a family he brutally murdered a century ago and then next-door a spirit with a deadly secret haunts a young couple.

A woman feels the presence of a ghost in her own bed; the ghosts of two sisters haunts a Civil War-era house; a castle built on a Native American burial ground is haunted by the spirits of Indians; encounters at a bed and breakfast are reported by guests staying there; and a haunted abandoned hospital.

A man and his girlfriend dream of owning their own "haunted attraction," but end up owning an actual haunted house; the ghostly voice of a passenger who died in a plane crash is heard in a chilling recording; video evidence proves that an Indiana bar is haunted; a secretary doesn't believe the rumors that her office building is haunted until strange happenings force her to flee one eerie night; and a dog meets a ghost boy at the historic Andrew Woods house in Pennsylvania.

A phantom breaches security at a South Carolina government building; a pipe-smoking ghost haunts a lighthouse; a son killed in a car accident makes his presence known to his grieving mother; a demon attacks guests at a Texas house, leaving scratch marks across their bodies; visitors to a restaurant restroom encounter a strange force strong enough to make grown men cry; and a woman in Minnesota captures haunting photos and unbelievable video of the spirits in her home.

A cemetery that's home to 80,000 dead souls becomes a "ghost magnet"; a family discovers that their new home is filled with the sounds of strange footsteps and whispered conversations; after a woman comes face-to-face with an apparition at her Kentucky farm, she sets to videotape her new ghostly friend; the spirits of children happily haunt an inn, playing pranks and giggling out loud; and angry entities force a couple out of their home.

The ghostly antics of two young boys killed at Christmas time in 1964 are captured on video; the tortured souls of a sanitarium haunt a California house; chilling photos and recordings document intense paranormal activity at a railroad near the site of the Battle of Gettysburg; there's a real "phantom of the opera house" in Kentucky; and the ghost of a woman peers forever out a window in hopes that she'll see her lover come for her.

A tourist says he was knifed in the back by a violent ghost in Tombstone, Ariz.; a dead wife jealously haunts her husband and his new girlfriend; a woman snaps the picture of a smiling apparition; and a ghost named Charlie messes with the minds of employees at a New York City bar.
A man encounters poltergeists; a woman communicates with a dozen spirits; ghosts chase a man from his home; a couple captures photos of a ghost; and two friends see the ghost of a Civil War soldier.
An old schoolhouse is haunted by the spirits of former teachers and students; a man contemplating suicide is helped by a supernatural force; and two women contact apparitions at a haunted castle.
An abandoned hospital is haunted by a shadowy figure; a building is haunted by the ghost of a man whose head was severed there by an elevator; and an Irish pub is haunted by a disfigured spirit.

Episode.EpisodeName: Things That Go Bump in the Night
Episode.Overview: The second-season finale: video footage of a haunting at a home where a baby was scalded to death; recordings and photos from a home haunted by a Catholic bishop; the haunting of a couple's dream home; and an inn in Georgia where the spirit of a woman roams the halls.

Paranormal activity haunts a Texas bar where the owner committed suicide; a psychic mentally transports herself back to the time when the spirits inhabiting a Chicago theater lived; a family is shaken when the ghost of an elderly man haunts their son; and psychics believe that up to 50 spirits have haunted a former Pennsylvania speakeasy, making it a spirit portal. "No More Last Calls" Humble, TX "Documenting Death"- Chicago, IL (Congress Theater) "Spooky in Spokane"- Spokane, WA "Cemetery Secrets"- Oswego, IL (Oswego Cemetery) "Tim's Spooky Treasures"- Charleroi, PA

Hell-o, dolly: A couple s lives unravel after they find a strange porcelain doll in a dead, burnt-out tree. Plus, the spirits of speakeasy patrons haunt a ghostly inn; the terrifying image of a flying spirit is caught on tape; an Illinois custom body shop may be haunted by Al Capone's henchmen; and a playful spirit investigator gets the ghosts at a New Mexico hotel to scare his friends in another room.

Episode.GuestStars: cable lists as s3e20, locate tv lists episode 17
Episode.Overview: A new police chief discovers her department headquarters is haunted; disembodied voices hurl curses at visitors to a Kentucky home; a restaurant owner is locked in a battle with the spirit of a former worker who murdered his wife and himself; and investigators exploring a Pennsylvania ghost town capture the voice of a ghost who exclaims, "I come here in solace in the sign of God."

Ghosts' voices are recorded at an Ohio prison; spirits dwell in a Texas house; a woman is menaced by the ghost of a young girl; and an apparition inhabits a church in Oklahoma. "Ghosts of Conviction"- Mansfield, Ohio "How the Bell Tolls"- Fort Collins, Colorado "Spirits of the Departed"- Austin, Texas "Playtime Possession"- Elk Grove, California "Church of Darkness"- Olive Township, Oklahoma

A strange mist is seen in Gettysburg, Pa.; the ghost of a woman appears in a 19th-century jail; unexplained voices are heard in a building that was built on burial grounds; and a boy is assaulted by a spirit at a former Alabama plantation. Also: a room in which four people have mysteriously died.
"He Who Must Not Be Named"- Salt Lake City, Utah "Leave Those Kids Alone"- St. Augustine, Florida "Middle Burning Town Hall"- Middleboro, Massachusetts "Patton Was A Fake"- Gettysburg, Pennsylvania "Damnation Plantation"-Lineville, Alabama

A boy is attacked by an entity; a man battles the spirit of a dead man; ghosts call out an investigator's name; and a woman photographs orbs around her son. "Gruesome Twosome"- Saulte Saints Marie, MI "Dedman vs Dead Man"-Harrodsburg, KY "Phantoms of the Opera House"-Arcadia, FL "A Penny Spurned" - Patterson, NY

After finding arrowheads on his property, a man discovers his house is haunted by cannibalistic Native Americans who once inhabited his land; video of a little boy's spirit named "Christifier" who died in 1855 is seen moving a wheelchair; a waitress who was stabbed to death inside her house is seen in a bedroom mirror captured in a photo by the current homeowners; managers at a trailer park find a black mass in their home and their health quickly deteriorates; and a sensitive is shocked when a disembodied voice changes her tone through an EVP.
"Little Dead Riding Hood"- St. Meinrad, Indiana "Christifier Was Here"- Naperville, Illinois "Dance With the Devil"- Fort Wayne, Indiana "Trailer Park Portal"- Bodfish, California "Bury the Pratchett"- Montgomery, New York

Two women capture an EVP of Jesse James at an historic tavern; evidence of a ball rolling by an unseen force and the voice of a little boy looking for his mother at a reform school for boys; a woman on a tour at a naval museum comes into contact with the spirits of a young sailor from the U.S.S. Hunchback and Civil War journalist Charles Coffin on the U.S.S. Hartford; a paranormal team experience unexplainable activity at an old library, from a black shadow mass to a book moving off a shelf; and a. green mist manifests during a séance at a cemetery. "Ghostly Gunslinger" - Bardstown, KY "Get the Ball Rolling" - Jones, CA "Souls Adrift" - Port Columbus, GA "Checked Out" - Carnegie. PA

A child apparition appears to a 3-year-old boy in a PA hotel; a man is scratched by an evil spirit; and the ghost of a Civil War soldier's wife lurks near the site of the Battle of Antietam (Comcast). "Living the American Nightmare"- Memphis, TN "A Very Complex Ghost"- Napoleon, IN "Ghostly Guest"-Conneaut Lake, PA "Once in a Black Moon"-Greenfield, IN "The Spirits of Anteatun"-Urbana, MD

A young girl's ghost is encountered at an asylum; a woman is confronted by the spirits of dead sailors on a ship. "Asylum 49'- Tooleh, Utah 'Blackford Hospital Horrors'- Hartford City, Indiana 'Roaming Ghosts of Joliet'- Joliet, Illinois 'Soldiers of Misfortune'- Bremerton, Washington (USS Turner Joy) 'Game Room Ghost'- Thousand Oaks, California (private residence)

After a woman investigates a building from the early 1900s, she encounters a little ghost girl who likes to play hide and seek; waiters at a haunted restaurant established in 1852 serve phantom patrons; a couple experiences paranormal activity from the ghost of a bank robber who was killed in their historic home; when deer hunters find human remains of a kidnapper on a woman's property, the dead body's spirit haunts inside her house; and investigators capture a photo of a white mist hovering above a bed
at an old school now a bed and breakfast. "Hide and Seek"- Elizabethtown, KY "Squirmin' at the Sherman"- Batesville, IN "Hamilton House Ghosts" Hamilton, NJ "To Catch a Predator...From Beyond"- Germantown, WI "After School Activity"- Joplin, MO

An antique doll moves on its own;a woman senses the presence of her deceased grandmother; and an apparition is captured on video (Comcast). "Love Never Dies"- Westminster, MA "Stage and Scream"- Savannah, GA "Lucky 13"-Prestonsburg, KY "Chilling Child"- Sunderland, England "Paranormal Antiquity"- Saul Centre, MN

Friends search for spirits in Virginia City, Nev.; two men hear strange voices in an old sanatorium; and an apparition appears after a man digs up a buried tombstone (Comcast). "What's the Dog Barking At?"- Oconomowoc, WI "Beyond the Grave"- Wellsburd, WV "There Be Ghosts In Them Hills"- Virginia City, NV "Sanitorium of Spirits"- Pine City, MN "Burlington Ghost Factory"- Mount Holly, NJ

Large orbs are captured on investigators video cameras in an unusual 8-sided house. Horrific screams of a woman who lost her child to fever are heard at one of the most haunted forts in the country; a paranormal team gets more then they bargain for when they encounter an inmate's spirit during their investigation at a haunted Australian jail; two woman come into contact with an evil entity believed to be the Madame of a former brothel turned restaurant; and a woman gets touched by a spirit and captures it on camera at an old schoolhouse she purchased to open as a bed and breakfast. A woman encounters an apparition at a bed-and-breakfast; a ghost attacks a man in a Pennsylvania house. "Two women encounter a ghost in a Charleston SC jail; a spirit torments a policeman's dog; and a woman senses the presence of her dead husband (Comcast)." A bearded ghost tries to drown a girl in a bathtub; Prohibition-era spirits haunt the basement of a former speak-easy; a conspirator in Abraham Lincoln's assassination makes a ghostly return to his old home. A ghost hunting team is warned by an angel reader not to investigate a dark entity in a jail basement--but the team goes in anyway. Plus: Thrill-seekers look for paranormal activity in a cemetery on Halloween and find it; a woman discovers that her late husband is watching over her; and after a driver comes upon a deadly car crash, she's shocked to find the apparition of one of the accident victims in her backseat "Eternal Time Out"- Clinton, New Jersey "Eternally Incarcerated"- Central City, Colorado "Orbs of Anarchy"- Independence, Kansas "Hauntingly Ever After"- Ixonia, Wisconsin "Psychic Sisters"- London, Ontario CA

A couple sees books flying off shelves; evidence of a crazed prostitute; the spirits of an angry clan chief and a noblewoman and her dog.

A Kentucky tavern is haunted by a voice; a spirit grabs a woman's leg at an old Iowa home; moving curtains, strange lights, children's voices, and dark shadows haunt a community center; old Revolutionary War grudges are revisited. England's 18th-century Hellfire Caves; two men team up to capture evidence of a little boy's spirit; the unexplained sounds of giggling children frighten the owners of an old farm house.

Rewind"- Union City, Ohio

The spirit of Mark Twain's daughter roams the great author's old house; a ghost appears in a photograph; the voices of spirits at a mass grave site; the spirits of prisoners at a Canadian gallows. "Ghost Writer"- Hartford, Connecticut "We'll Leave the Fright On'- Temecula, California "Fright at the Museum"- Dumfries, Virginia "Hostel Environment"- Ottowa, Canada '50 Shades of Ghost'- Covington, Georgia

The ghosts of the ladies who worked in an old bordello; investigators at a California farm discover that a spirit is among them; a ghost with a sweet tooth. "Step Town Spirits"- Chesapeake, Ohio "Ladies of the Fright"- Napanoch, New York "Cowboos and Indians"- Galt, California "Clean-Up on Aisle 666"- Brompton, Adelaide Australia "Squabbling Spirits"- Lewisburg, Kentucky

"Black Mist At the Black Swan Inn"- San Antonio, Texas "Last Call At the Cat & Fiddle"- Hollywood, California "Ghost In My Bed"- Tampa, Florida "The Busby Bully"- Thirsk, North Yorkshire England "Hotel on the Hill"- Corbin, Kentucky

"Last Call At the Far Side Lounge"- Colorado Springs, Colorado "Sour Grapes"- St. Helena, California "The Ghostman Always Rings Twice"- Salvisa, Kentucky "Unsettled Settlers"- Dial, Texas "Eternal Playtime"- Rush City, Minnesota

Two former classmates return to their old, abandoned high school and discover the ghost of the old janitor is still on the job. Plus, an ancient shapeshifting demon torments a woman; a spirit with the macabre name of Elvira haunts a Missouri mansion; and when a paranormal team captures spectacular photographic evidence of a mother and child who have been separated in the afterlife, they make a dramatic effort to reunite them and free their tortured souls. "Bad Will Hunting"- Wellington, Kansas "Shapeshifter Showdown"- Kingsville, Missouri "Liberating Spirits"- Liberty, Arizona

The ghosts of inmates executed in the gas chambers of a Missouri penitentiary can be heard crying out, "Let me out!"; red orbs appearing near a woman warn her that something terrible is about to happen to her husband; and guests at a New Jersey hotel swear they've heard the sound of furniture being moved in empty rooms and seen impressions form on their beds as if someone were lying in them. "Afterlife Without Parole"- Jefferson City, Missouri "The Mothman Cometh" - Helm, Washington "The Ghost That Rocks the Cradle" - Hoosick Falls, New York "Do Not Disturb" - Bayhead, New Jersey

An investigator captures a terrifying photo of an apparition thought to have been part of a Ku Klux Klan lynch mob; a saloon of lost souls marks the site of one of the worst fires in American history; visitors hear the sound of children crying in closets in Tennessee's "Enchanted Castle"; the ghost of a child named Middy, who always appears blue, haunts a former Civil War field hospital; and a terrified wife discovers that an angry spirit is out to get her husband. "Occurrence at Goat Man Bridge"- Denton, Texas "Saloon of Lost Souls"- Boyertown, Pennsylvania "The Enchanted Castle"- Lebanon, Tennessee "Mansion of the Macabre"- Marceline, Missouri

A terrifying invisible force invades a former nursing home; a house is haunted by a girl who can be seen in a century-old picture pictured of the house; dark spirits harass the owner of a Massachusetts home; the former residents of a Kansas asylum still roam its halls; and a universe of unexplainable orbs are captured on camera at an old Civil War building in Kentucky. "Post Mortem Clinic"- Harmony, North Carolina "The Mist and the Pendulum"- Fitchburg, Massachusetts "The Soul Asylum"- Chetopa, Kansas "The Taking of Bowling Green"- Bowling Green, Kentucky

Investigators fear an evil entity has trapped the spirits of children inside an old boys' school; the souls of the dead killed in a train wreck may be haunting a Pennsylvania school; an estate owner becomes too frightened to stay in the home alone when strange whispers in the house turn to screams; and a ghost hunter investigating a pool hall finds evidence of full-bodied apparitions and the paranormal energy of a woman who was once--and still may be--a customer. "Pupils in Purgatory"- Park City, Kentucky "Out of the Shadows"- Middletown, Ohio "From a Whisper to a Scream"- Mitchell, Indiana "Side Pocket Spirits"- Austin, Texas "Where There's Smoke, There's Fear"- Galax, Virginia

Investigators capture blood-curdling screams at a former lunatic asylum; a ghost hunting team develops shocking video of a dark entity; a woman and her friend hear a haunting EVP of ancient Native Americans chanting. "Catch the Mist, Catch the Myth"- Louisville, Kentucky "Child Killer"- Westland, Michigan "The Gropes of Wrath"- Kampsville, Illinois "A Hooker's Revenge"- Virginia City, Nevada "Copy Cat Ghost"- Bethel, Ohio
